message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you first because I think it would be a great fit.  I'm asking for $18,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. While $18,000 is my ideal price, I'm willing to come down a bit.  How about we settle at $15,000?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $15,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet at $13,000?
